about_the_game:
Build by Day, Survive by Night!
In City Defense Z, every sunrise is a chance to strategize, and every sunset is a battle for survival. Use the precious daylight to manage your resources, place buildings, and merge structures of the same type to create powerful upgrades. But beware—when night falls, the zombie horde will test your defenses to the limit.

Strategic Depth Meets Intense Action

● Plan Your City: Utilize your space wisely to maximize efficiency and strengthen your defenses. Every decision counts.
● Merge & Upgrade: Combine buildings during the day to unlock stronger structures and game-changing advantages.
● Defend Against the Horde: As darkness descends, unleash your strategy and watch your city fight back against relentless zombie waves.

Can You Survive the Night?

In City Defense Z, you’ll face the ultimate test of your decision-making skills. Limited time during the day forces you to think fast and act faster. Will your city stand tall, or will it crumble under the weight of the undead? The fate of your citizens is in your hands.

Key Features

● Main Building Protection: Keep your city’s heart standing to stay in the game.
● Resource Management: Master the art of building by using your limited resources effectively.
● Building Merging: Merge more than 25 unique buildings to create more powerful structures.
● Defense Strategy: Position your troops and deploy support to counter zombie waves throughout the night.
● Dynamic Day-Night Cycle: Strategize during the day and fight for survival at night.
● Evolving Challenges: Face increasingly difficult waves of zombies as your city grows.

Building Classes

● Barracks: Provides ammunition to defend your city with various defense units.
● House: Increases your population limit to host more citizens.
● Factory: Supports economic growth by producing resources.
● Farm: Feeds your population by producing food.
● Academy: Offers military and economic advantages through technology research.

Prepare. Plan. Survive.

The fate of your city is in your hands. Add City Defense Z to your wishlist now and prove your resilience against the zombie apocalypse!

name: City Defense Z

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX970
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-11700K
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce RTX2060
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse

short_description: City Defense Z is a strategy-based city-building and survival game where you construct your city by placing and merging identical buildings during the day and defend it against relentless zombie attacks at night.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Turkish
